text.1_Siftei Da'at, 12_Siman, 15_Seif, 0_Par: Since it walked on the ground (Shach). If it didn't walk, it is permitted by the slaughter of its mother rabbinically. If its mother died, and [the fetus] is a nine month fetus that died, it is forbidden rabbinically. If a nine month fetus lives, it is permitted rabbinically through its own slaughter.
